casebody.data:
Ephraim HASPEL, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. BONNAZ, SINGER & HAND EMBROIDERERS, TUCKERS, STITCHERS & PLEATERS UNION, LOCAL 66, Defendant-Appellee. No. 12, Docket 23051. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 15,1954. Decided Oct. 29, 1954. George E. Reynolds, New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. Elias Lieberman, New York City, for defendant-appellee.

Before CHASE, MEDINA and HARLAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion below. D.C., 112 F.Supp. 944.
